trans-unit.source: Represents the data context of the current workflow environment and provides a bridge to bring workflow arguments and variables into the scope of [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/add/includes/avalon1-md.md)] data binding.
trans-unit.target: Representa o contexto de dados do ambiente atual do fluxo de trabalho e fornece uma ponte para trazer os argumentos de fluxo de trabalho e variáveis no escopo do [!INCLUDE[avalon1](~/add/includes/avalon1-md.md)] associação de dados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the resources used by the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext"></xref>.
Returns the collection of properties managed by this <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a coleção de propriedades gerenciadas por esse <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The collection of properties managed by this <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de propriedades gerenciadas por esse <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowDataContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a property value changes.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando uma alteração de valor de propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The PropertyChanged event can indicate all properties on the object have changed by using either `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) or <xref:String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> as the property name in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O evento PropertyChanged pode indicar todas as propriedades do objeto foram alterados usando `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) ou <xref:String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>como o nome da propriedade em <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyChangedEventArgs> </xref:String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>
